title: Bed Bath & Beyond Names Sue Gove as New CEO
description: Sue Gove had been the interim leader of the struggling retail chain, which is in the process of closing 150 stores across the United States.
dc:creator: Jordyn Holman
media:credit: John Taggart for The New York Times
